title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer with justification.

Since the Sn electrode is losing mass, Sn atoms must be forming Sn2+(aq). This process is oxidation.

OR

because the cell operates, E° must be positive and, based on the E° values from the table, it must be Sn that is oxidized.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer with justification.

Since the Sn electrode is losing mass, Sn atoms must be forming Sn2+(aq). This process is oxidation.

OR

because the cell operates, E° must be positive and, based on the E° values from the table, it must be Sn that is oxidized.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer with justification.

Since the Sn electrode is losing mass, Sn atoms must be forming Sn2+(aq). This process is oxidation.

OR

because the cell operates, E° must be positive and, based on the E° values from the table, it must be Sn that is oxidized.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer.

The atoms on the Sn electrode are going into the solution as Sn2+ ions.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer.

The atoms on the Sn electrode are going into the solution as Sn2+ ions.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer.

The atoms on the Sn electrode are going into the solution as Sn2+ ions.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correct representation of both K+ and NO3- ions. (Including free electrons loses this point.)

1 point is earned for correctly indicating the direction of movement of both ions.

The response should show at least one K+ ion moving toward the Cu compartment on the left and at least one NO3- ion moving in the opposite direction.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1. 1 point is earned for the correct answer with justification.

    It is the same. In the cell reaction Q = [Sn 2 + ] [Cu 2 + ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfwBIj xAHbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8srps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGrbGaeyypa0ZaaSaaae aacaqGBbGaae4uaiaab6gadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdacqGHRaWkaaGc caGGDbaabaGaae4waiaaboeacaqG1bWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaGaey 4kaScaaOGaaiyxaaaaaaa@3FD5@ , and the concentrations of Sn2+ and Cu2+ are equal to each other in both cases.

  2. 1 point is earned for the correct answer with justification.

    The nonstandard cell would power the device for a shorter time because the supply of Cu2+ ions will be exhausted more quickly.

    OR

    The nonstandard cell would power the device for a shorter time because the reaction will reach E = 0 more quickly.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
1. 1 point is earned for the correct net-ionic equation.

    Cu2+(aq) + Sn(s) → Cu(s) + Sn2+(aq)

    1 point is earned for a correct justification (unit not needed in calculation).

    E° is positive (0.34 V + 0.14 V = 0.48 V), therefore the reaction is thermodynamically favorable.

    OR

    The cell observations from earlier parts of the question are evidence that the Sn is oxidized and Cu is reduced, therefore E° must be positive.

  2. 1 point is earned for the correct number of electrons.

    1 point is earned for the correct answer with unit.

    ∆G° = -nFE°

    Δ G = − 2 mol  e − mol r x n × 96 , 485  C mol  e − × 0.48  J C = − 93 , 000  J/mol r x n = − 93  kJ/mol r x n MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfwBIj xAHbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8srps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHuoarcaWGhbGaeyypa0 JaeyOeI0YaaSaaaeaacaqGYaGaaeiiaiaab2gacaqGVbGaaeiBaiaa bccacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGHsislaaaakeaacaqGTbGaae4Bai aabYgadaWgaaWcbaGaamOCaiaadIhacaWGUbaabeaaaaGccqGHxdaT daWcaaqaaiaaiMdacaaI2aGaaiilaiaaisdacaaI4aGaaGynaiaabc cacaqGdbaabaGaaeyBaiaab+gacaqGSbGaaeiiaiaadwgadaahaaWc beqaaiabgkHiTaaaaaGccqGHxdaTdaWcaaqaaiaaicdacaGGUaGaaG inaiaaiIdacaqGGaGaaeOsaaqaaiaaboeaaaGaeyypa0JaeyOeI0Ia aGyoaiaaiodacaGGSaGaaGimaiaaicdacaaIWaGaaeiiaiaabQeaca qGVaGaaeyBaiaab+gacaqGSbWaaSbaaSqaaiaadkhacaWG4bGaamOB aaqabaGccqGH9aqpcqGHsislcaaI5aGaaG4maiaabccacaqGRbGaae Osaiaab+cacaqGTbGaae4BaiaabYgadaWgaaWcbaGaamOCaiaadIha caWGUbaabeaaaaa@73CF@
